name: Mclust4.4pro
tagline: MClust (by AD Redish) is a MATLAB GUI tool to cluster NEURON-SPIKES. I optimize it from V-4.4 .
body:
# MClust 4.4pro


---

## Welcome to MClust
**MClusthere, is a MATLAB GUI tool, for neuroscientist to cluster extracellular recording.**

## Offical Infomation
+ **Author:** A David Redish, University of Minnesota
+ **Last Version:** V4.4.04; 2016/06/13
+ **Offical Site:** [HERE](http://redishlab.neuroscience.umn.edu/MClust/MClust.html)
+ **CopyRight:** This code is copyright Â© by the original authors (see above), 1998-2013. Free for using.
+ **More Info:** See `MClust-4-4.docx`.

## What do I Optimize
### Describe
- [x]  Add `PCA` and `Wavelet`for `feature`, which are **more effective for single-eletrode cluster**.
- [x] Add a common `LoadEngine`, for load a `MAT` file.
- [x] Add a **Visual clustering edge**.
- [x] Optimize the cluster **color-order**, match the MATLAB defaults scheme.
- [x] Fix the ylim share bugs.

### Desplay
![main layout](http://static.zybuluo.com/chenxinfeng/jc1bxf5k88k9jk4eh1v7yxby/image_1ao6v80pp88a7ak16pf1423ubq9.png)
![Cluster GUI](http://static.zybuluo.com/chenxinfeng/cqxuvr0j02c07mk9cbhuf0mw/image_1ao70ahof1gvq1bltfsekon3qum.png)
![waveform](http://static.zybuluo.com/chenxinfeng/mvu6rpafgijcmhtzkpotqwcn/image_1ao70m92aceq1tular149r186k13.png)

## What puzzle me
Offical **MClust** has a brief manual `MClust-4-4.docx`, but it's not detailed. 
I don't know how to use `Select from KKwik`, `Run SPC`, `Use "_t"`, `ApplyCvHulls`,`ShowCrosscorr`...

### About me
Chen Xinfeng, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China.
